basic.description: This course is designed to acquaint graduate students with some of the teaching and research responsibilities of a graduate student. Topics may include: course planning, presentation and preparation; grant writing; publishing; giving artist talks and presenting conference papers. Seminars devoted to current research and research-creation will change on a yearly basis. The course is compulsory for all students over the first and second years of their program. Grading is on a Pass/Fail basis. Students are required to attend eight seminars in the first year of their program and six in the second year.
basic.subject: CUST
basic.title: Seminar Series
